Pitstop | Toronto, ON | Full-Time | On-Site | www.pitstopconnect.com

We’re looking for a Full-time Android Developer to join our team!

At Pitstop, we use a combination of a telematics device + a mobile app which monitors real-time sensor data from the engine to detect issues and alert the user. We send these alerts to the service centres and to the driver, who can also request service from the service centre. We also use ML to predict when an engine failure will occur.

Interview process: Phone call; On site technical interview; Coding challenge

More info about the position: https://angel.co/pitstop/jobs/97560-lead-mobile-developer-an...

If you’re interested, please email me at nitish@pitstopconnect.com or apply through the AngelList link above :)
